1.content: Who is going to be shrunk?
1.title: Who?

112.content: Why does Toph shrink Aang?
112.title: Toph

1123.content:
Aang had just finished his waterbending training with Katara when he decided to take a break and sit down, he was going to begin earthbending with Toph soon so he needed to rest.

Toph saw this and thought it would be the perfect time to mess with him but what would she do? At that moment Toph's stomach began to cry out and an evil idea came to her, as Aang rested Toph snuck up behind him and turned around placing her large ass on the back of Aang's head. Before he could even understand what was going on Toph let out a nasty fart right on his head, Aang recoiled in disgust and Toph nearly fell over laughing. Right before Aang berated Toph for her actions, he took one breath through his nose and felt lightheaded, he lost balance and crashed to the floor.

Toph's laughing fit was interrupted by Aang falling, she was about to laugh again knowing he passed out from the smell when all of a sudden Aang's unconscious body started to shrink, Toph could hardly believe it and if she hadn't felt it herself she wouldn't have. Toph slowly crawled over to the now tiny Aang, he was small enough to fit in her hand being only a few inches in size, she looked at him wondering what could've done this when the idea of her fart shrinking him came to her, she had no way to be sure unless she tested it again.

Aang slowly rose from the ground, he felt wrong for many different reasons; he was lightheaded, his body felt numbed, he could barely think, and his whole being felt different. He tried to look around but the images he saw were blurry and got mixed around in his head, he eventually came to and found himself sitting in the middle of a large field made of rock. He looked around trying to find answers until he looked at his back and saw the massive face of his earthbending master Toph. Aang being absolutely terrified, tried to airbend away from her but found he was unable to do so, his heart raced uncontrollably as he saw her massive lips parting in an effort to speak.

"Aang, is that really you?"

Toph's voice boomed at Aang and he nearly lost his balance, he stared up at her terrified.

"How is this even possible?" Aang noticed a smile starting to form on Toph's face, a smile that didn't bode well for the little Avatar.

Toph stared down at the doll-sized airbender unsure of what to do, until an idea popped into her head. With Aang being so small and defenseless without his bending, Toph would be able to do whatever she wanted with him. Toph reached down to grab Aang, she smiled knowing what was in store for him.

Aang saw Toph's large hands coming down to grab him and tried to run away, she grabbed him with ease and brought him up to her face.

"Well twinkle toes, I don't know exactly how this happened but I have an idea. I'm gonna put that idea to the test but trust me, you aren't gonna like it." As soon as Toph finished speaking a huge grin plagued her face and Aang was sent flying though the air as Toph moved her hand. Aang lost balance and focus and couldn't tell where he was going, when he finally stopped moving he found himself staring at what looked like a piece of Toph's clothing.

Aang was left hovering in front of Toph still not knowing exactly where he was on her body, that was when he noticed the smell emanating from what was in front of him. At first he thought it may have been her clothes which she forgot to wash but then it hit him, he knew what the smell was and what part of Toph this was, it was her ass.

"Enjoying the view down there twinkle toes? Or maybe you prefer the smell?" Toph giggled at the little airbenders predicament, she placed her free hand on her ass cheek.

"I bet my butt looks massive from down there!" She gave her cheek a squeeze and slapped it.

"Bet it smells pretty strong too, here let me give you a better whiff!" Toph pressed Aang's tiny body against her ass, she forced his face into her crack and forced him to sniff her terrible scent.

"Hows that? Here I'll make it even stronger for you, better hold on tight!" Aang heard a rumbling noise coming from Toph's ass and knew what was going to happen, he braced for impact.

A massive blast of air hit Aang head on joined by an incredible sound, the air was warm and powerful and it left him disoriented. That was when the smell hit, the smell was disgusting and made him sick, to make it worse the fart lingered leaving him stuck in a cloud of warm smelly gas. Toph eventually brought him back to her face and smelled him.

"Wow you stink!" Toph fanned her nose in fake disgust.

"I'm shocked that the Avatar could be defeated so easily, all it took was one measly girl fart!" Moments after Toph finished speaking, Aang began to shrink at an alarming rate until he was less than an inch tall.

"It actually worked! That's how you shrunk before, it was because of my fart!" Having this new information, Toph came up with a devious plan for Aang.

But what was her plan?
1123.title: Aware evil

choices: She wants to continue her own life, but to do that she needs to break the Avatar
She tries to teach him strength, and puts him through some smelly training.
She’s just flat out bored! Being a spirit can’t be amusing for someone like her.

Sokka gets a teasing  facefart from Suki once they are dating

14.content: Who will Katara be shrunken by?
14.title: Katara

choices: Azula secretly infiltrates Team Avatar’s campsite, and takes Katara captive.
Katara gets captured after the day of black sun. Azula gets a prisoners of war.
Katara is in the palace looking for info on the fire nation. She gets gassed
142.content: Oh no! Katara is definitely in for a rough time. But how does Azula’s ass get access to Katara’s nose?
142.title: Azula

choices: She knows about her smelly power, and goes on the hunt for a new slave.
She has no idea she has this power, and is confused.
She summons one of her friends to help figure out where the clothes came from
1423.content:
Katara ducked inside a large wardrobe, belonging to none other than the crown princess herself! She managed to sneak in disguised as a servant, though due to some disagreements with the rest of her friends, no one else joined her on this perilous mission.

Azula walked into the room, an entourage of three handmaidens following behind her incredibly fat backside.

”Draw me a bath!” She ordered like a cruel brat, pushing one into the enormous bathroom that joined on to the room.

Whilst she waited, she forced the other two handmaidens to pick the grime from her toes without any remorse. Katara didn’t want to feel sorry for anyone in the fire nation, but she did shed a tear at the thought of serving such a cruel girl. And that was before she shoved the putrid soles into the poor servant’s noses.

”Terrible! You are a waste of space and should be ashamed that you can’t even serve properly! Even Earth Kingdom peasants have serviced my feet better than you pathetic worms.“

Thankfully, for her servants at least, her bath was prepared and she rose from her seated position and stripped nude with the help of her maids.

Katara blushed, trying to look away but unable to. Despite Azula being horribly evil and twisted, she had the best body the waterbender had ever seen!

After a few orders, the maids left and Azula entered her boiling hot bath. Katara may not have been able to find any information on the fire nation so far, but Azula was here, totally unsuspecting of a strike. She could take out the fire nation princess right now!

There was no moral deliberation, it was the only thing to do. She snuck out of the wardrobe, and slipped into the bathroom.

Azula was laying in the steaming water, her eyes closed as she relaxed. She was totally unaware of Katara preparing a sharp icicle, ready to end her.

She was about to finish the job when bubbles rose from between Azula’s shapely thighs, followed by a deep rumbly gurgle.

*GRRRBBBBLLLLLLLEEEEEEE*

”Ahhh, too many fire flakes” she groaned to herself in relief as the unmistakable stench of rotting, digested meat took over the whole room.

Katara was stunned, seeing (and smelling) this very human side of someone she considered a monster! And it was dreadful! It made Toph smell like roses even! She felt her nose hairs curling in agony on the humid power of Azula’s smelly release.

Despite the awful stench, Katara managed to remain silent! Though another effect was coming, she was quickly dwindling out of her clothing!

The walls of the bathtub extended far into the sky as the now 3” waterbender struggled to escape her own clothes!

————————————————————————

It was only after an hour that Azula was ready to leave the bath, and she saw the waterbender clothes...

info.brief_description: The girls from Avatar shrink other characters with their farts, on purpose or not.
info.description:
The girls from Avatar suddenly gain the power to shrink people with their farts, this puts other characters in some unpleasant situations. The shrinking can be on purpose or unaware.

This story is based off of a similar story that was deleted from the website. I'm fine with additions as long as it doesn't differ much from the initial premise and as long as it is written well.

One important thing to know is that while anyone can shrink, given enough time they will slowly grow back to their original size. You can scrap this idea if it directly goes against what you want to write about or even change it to something else, just know that not all paths will follow the same rules if this is the case.
info.pretty_title: Avatar the last Airbender Giantess Fart
